data.actual_result: It's being overlapped by a bar slowly sliding up in unison with the in-app notification's timer bar until the in-app notification disappears
data.short_description: Emote and mention drawer gets overlapped by a slowly sliding bar during in-app notification's presence (Potentially iPhone X exclusive)
data.steps_to_repro: - Receive an in-app notification - Start to mention someone or type an emote to bring out the drawer
